name: df-funpart
body: |- wceq(cfunpart(c0), cres(c0, cdm(cin(ccom(cimage(c0), csingle), cxp(universe, csingles)))))
comment: Define the functional part of a class ` F ` . This is the maximal part of ` F ` that is a function. See ~ funpartfun and ~ funpartfv for the meaning of this statement. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Apr-2014.)
